text: I'm a nice, happily married wife and mom and I live in Connecticut.
author: Christine Baranski

text: My dad was a golden gloves boxer in the Marine Corps, then a deputy sheriff. My mom worked as an office assistant.
author: Susana Martinez

text: My mom was a model. She had me at 20, so she was a young mother.
author: Michael Kors

text: My mom and dad met at UCLA when he as a captain in the Air Force and she was in her junior year.
author: Tracy Austin

text: I've always believed fitness is an entry point to help you build that happier, healthier life. When your health is strong, you're capable of taking risks. You'll feel more confident to ask for the promotion. You'll have more energy to be a better mom. You'll feel more deserving of love.
author: Jillian Michaels
